name: Lennod Jump Game
description:
The land of Dnal is in trouble! A powerful force of unknown origin has swept over the land and infested the world with the Chaos Mushrooms. Only the man called Lennod can save the land, at the request of the Queen.

The Quest

Forget branching paths and side-quests. In this simple jump game, you have one goal: Reach the end and save the day. At all costs.

Gameplay

Control Lennod in his quest to save the land in this story-driven traditional 2d platformer. In order to achieve victory, you and Lennod must:

  • Manuever skillfully and quickly to avoid obstacles
  • Formulate strategies to navigate hostile terrain
  • Use your wits to defeat ferocious creatures
  • Collect food to sustain our hero on his quest
  • Collect score and complete challenges to unlock venerated achievements
  • Participate in athletic games
  • Solve a puzzle
  • Take to the stars and chase your enemies down in bullet combat
  • Jump!
  • Jump and Run!

Characters


Lennod

Lennod is one of the characters in all of human history. His eyepatch is infamous for its ability to cover his eye, and his signature walking technique is quite an enigmatic machination. You will discover in this journey that he is also quite skilled at jumping.

Queen of Dnal

The Queen of the land of Dnal. She is the one who requested to Lennod that he save the land with his jumping.

Chaos Mushroom's Leader (?)

The source of the chaotic Chaos Mushrooms...
Just who is this guy!?
And what are... his goals?
